channel.title: High Alch

item.title: High Alch
item.dc:creator: @LKCTheReturn LKCTheReturn
item.description:
@LKCTheReturn wrote:

Alright I am working with Testscape source and I was wonder how I might fix the direction of the gfx…
Lets say I was facing sound and alched the gfx is perfect, but if I faced any other direction the gfx would stay south while the player faced that other direction…

if(castSpell == 1178) //High Alch { if(playerLevel[6] >= 55) { if((playerHasItemAmount(561, 1) == false) || (playerHasItemAmount(554, 5) == false)) { sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell."); } else if((playerHasItemAmount(561, 1) == true) && (playerHasItemAmount(554, 5) == true)) { deleteItem(castOnItem, castOnSlot, 1); addItem(995, alchvaluez); addSkillXP((65*playerLevel[6]), 6); highalch(); //freeze setAnimation(713); stillgfx(113, absY, absX); setSidebarMage(); //switches back to magic book resetanim = 12; deleteItem(561,getItemSlot(561), 1); } }

thanks,
LKCTheReturn[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 20, 2009, 11:16:08 pm[/size][hr]Any ideas?
